actionTemplate.title: Map brows with 5 key points
steps: Mark lower brow head: vertical line up from inner eye corner
Mark upper brow head: 0.5 cm forward from inner corner, then up
Mark brow center: vertical above the outer iris/inner outer-corner zone
Mark brow peak: directly above brow center
Mark brow tail: line from nostril wing to outer eye corner; connect and fill

rationaleTemplate: 5-point mapping keeps brows balanced and symmetrical
Correct tail placement prevents droopy or overlong brows
